title: James Cleverly – 2022 Comments on Resignation of Oliver Dowden
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Cleverly, the Minister of State for Europe and North America, on 24 June 2022.
content:
Very sorry to see this.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

Fighting these by-elections during these circumstances, beyond your control, was always going to be incredibly difficult.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

All the best.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
